ISSUE.TITLE: [UI] Show runner name/architecture next to the build stage
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'd suggest to add the name and architecture of the runner executing a build stage to the log view, so you dont have to switch to graph view to see where your job is running. There is currently a lot of white space in the sidebar anyway, so it would fit nicely. Here you can see how it would look like: ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/19636565/167794640-21c49708-a91a-4ed0-9ecc-485b451c4d0f.png)
